name: ems_user3_loader_db
sql_load:
select 		
				u.id_usuario as id,
				u.id_pessoa as codigo,
				u.login as login,
				p.nome as name,
				p.cpf_cnpj as cpf,
				u.senha as password,
				'MD5' as passwd_crypto,
				p.endereco as endereco,
				p.complemento as complemento_endereco,
				p.bairro as bairro,
				p.cidade as cidade,
				p.uf as uf,
				p.cep as cep,
				null as rg,
				p.data_nascimento as data_nascimento,
				p.sexo as sexo,
				p.telefone as telefone,
				p.celular as celular,
				null as ddd,
				null as nome_pai,
				p.nome_mae as nome_mae,
				null as nacionalidade,
				u.email as email,
				1 as type,
				0 as subtype,
				case u.inativo when TRUE then 0 else 1 end as active,
				u.expira_senha as dt_expire_password, 
				case 
					 when p.datacadastramento > u.datacadastramento then p.datacadastramento 
					 else u.datacadastramento 
				end as ctrl_modified 
			 from comum.pessoa  p join rh.servidor s
			 on p.id_pessoa = s.id_pessoa 
			 join comum.usuario u 
			 on s.id_pessoa = u.id_pessoa
sql_update:
select 		
						u.id_usuario as id,
						u.id_pessoa as codigo,
						u.login as login,
						p.nome as name,
						p.cpf_cnpj as cpf,
						u.senha as password,
						'MD5' as passwd_crypto,
						p.endereco as endereco,
						p.complemento as complemento_endereco,
						p.bairro as bairro,
						p.cidade as cidade,
						p.uf as uf,
						p.cep as cep,
						null as rg,
						p.data_nascimento as data_nascimento,
						p.sexo as sexo,
						p.telefone as telefone,
						p.celular as celular,
						null as ddd,
						null as nome_pai,
						p.nome_mae as nome_mae,
						null as nacionalidade,
						u.email as email,
						1 as type,
						0 as subtype,
						case u.inativo when TRUE then 0 else 1 end as active,
						u.expira_senha as dt_expire_password, 
						case 
							when p.datacadastramento > u.datacadastramento then p.datacadastramento 
							else u.datacadastramento 
						end as ctrl_modified 
					from comum.pessoa  p join rh.servidor s 
					on p.id_pessoa = s.id_pessoa 
					join comum.usuario u 
					on s.id_pessoa = u.id_pessoa 
					where u.data_cadastro >= ? or p.ultima_atualizacao >= ? or 
				       p.dataalteracao >= ? or p.dataalteracao >= ? or 
  				       u.datacadastramento >= ? or p.datacadastramento >= ?
